name: FPS TRUE LOVE Your Viewers
description:
Please read the setup guide to learn how to set it up and see a list of available commands.

FPS TRUE LOVE Your Viewers requires you to be streaming to Twitch to be played.

To play the single player original version of FPS TRUE LOVE, click here!

FPS TRUE LOVE Your Viewers is a Twitch integrated version of FPS TRUE LOVE.

FPS TRUE LOVE is a first person kissing game in which you try to kiss as many cuties as you can without them overwhelming you.

So grab your best lipstick because it's time to start smooching!

Made by Savory Boys:

  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Coley Caverley
  • sketchnate
  • Robert Orange
